price: We will remove all ill feelings from their hearts[21]; like brothers, seated on couches facing one another.
arabic: وَنَزَعۡنَا مَا فِي صُدُورِهِم مِّنۡ غِلٍّ إِخۡوَٰنًا عَلَىٰ سُرُرٖ مُّتَقَٰبِلِينَ
footnotes: [21] This is in perfection of their bliss, by having no ill-will whatsoever.
